programme.desc: 1970. Diana decide aceitar o convite de Maximiliano para passear no iate da família e abandona o médico Montiel e seu motorista Andrés. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Acorrentada, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Diana chega sã e salva, mas Andrés espera para lembrá-la da consulta pendente com o Dr. Montiel; Gaby decide voltar para a mansão às custas de sua própria felicidade. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Acorrentada, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Maximiliano descobre as mentiras de Diana; Débora quase mata sua irmã Marfin. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Epiphany - Amor e Perdão, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Uma jovem luta para criar um relacionamento com o pai após a morte da tia que a criou. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: O Destino de Grace, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Após prestar serviços militares, uma enfermeira retorna para a fazenda de sua avó em Amish Country, onde ela encontra um romance inesperado e se vê envolvida em um misterioso caso de assassinato. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: A Disputa, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Para comemorar o aniversário de Hitler, os nazistas organizam uma partida de futebol entre um time de elite e um esquadrão de presos. Apesar dos obstáculos que enfrentam, a equipe dos prisioneiros está determinada a vencer, aconteça o que acontecer. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Com Amor, Van Gogh, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um ano após o suicídio de Vincent Van Gogh, Armand Roulin parte para a cidade francesa de Arles e, junto às pessoas que conheceram Vincent, inicia uma investigação no intuito de decifrar se o artista realmente se matou. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Life - Um Retrato de James Dean, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Em 1955, o fotógrafo Dennis Stock acompanha James Dean em uma viagem para a fazenda da família do ator. No local, Stock registra as imagens mais famosas de toda a carreira de Dean. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Kompromat - O Dossiê Russo, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um diplomata francês é enviado para a Sibéria, mas logo percebe que está envolvido em uma emboscada do Serviço de Segurança da Rússia. Agora ele não possui outra saída senão tentar escapar. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Roubo a Máfia, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Tommy e Rosie são um casal apaixonado, mas que acabam presos ao serem flagrados roubando. Após esse deslize, eles tentam ganhar a vida honestamente, mas logo ele se vê envolvido no julgamento de um famoso assassino da máfia. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Um Homem Comum, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um criminoso de guerra procurado mundo afora conhece uma empregada e um estranho relacionamento surge entre eles. Quando a calmaria parece estabelecida na vida dele, ela descobre que há uma recompensa milionária para quem souber onde o fugitivo está. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O inspetor de polícia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais se tornam vítimas de uma gangue. Os policiais são brutalmente assassinados e um jovem é designado para ajudá-lo, mas a gangue volta a agir, iniciando uma aventura cheia de ação e vingança. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Filha de Deus, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O detetive Scott Galban busca a verdade sobre a misteriosa morte de seu parceiro. Enquanto isso, Isabel de la Cruz, uma mulher local que diz ter sido testemunha de um milagre, começa a vivenciar estranhos acontecimentos. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Instinto Materno, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Após trauma, uma mãe solteira se muda com a filha para uma isolada fazenda no interior. Mas logo coisas sinistras voltam a acontecer e seus instintos maternos são colocados à prova novamente. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: O Ninho, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Samuel é um menino paraplégico que mora com a mãe Elena em uma mansão isolada. Quando conhece Denise, uma empregada adolescente, ele finalmente encontra forças para se opor às restrições de sua mãe e se abrir para o mundo. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: O Reino Gelado 3 - Fogo e Gelo, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O raro talento de se meter em problemas é o legado da família de Kai e Gerda. Crescidos, os irmãos se metem em um desastre de proporções globais, tudo para encontrar seus pais que estão desaparecidos após serem levados pelo Vento do Norte. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Um Acampamento do Barulho, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Encorajado pelo avô, Spence tenta aprender a lidar com seus medos e a fazer novos amigos em um acampamento cristão. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Três Ladrões e um Bebê, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O compulsivo jogador Slipper vê o sequestro do neto de um magnata a salvação de suas dívidas. Quando, junto com seu senhorio e o oportunista Octopus, sequestra BB, sem saber, frustram os planos do crime organizado, que também está atrás da criança. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Meu Querido Elfo, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Uma mãe solteira compra um apartamento antigo, sem saber que uma criatura mítica, um elfo, vive no apartamento há séculos. Os novos donos da casa precisam fazer amizade com a criatura, cuja tarefa é justamente proteger o local de uma bruxa. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Uma Aventura e Tanto, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O cão vira-lata Pluto aparece de repente e muda a vida da família Davis, que está enfrentando tempos difíceis. Em pouco tempo, ele salva uma criança, traz conforto a um garoto doente e repara um relacionamento desgastado de pai e filho. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Ma ma, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Após ser diagnosticada com câncer de mama, Magda descobre estar grávida. Além de contar com o apoio de seu novo companheiro e do filho, ela acredita no poder de cura da menina que espera. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Nosso Amor, (1970)

programme.title: 2011. Clyde desobedece sua mãe e deixa o assento da privada levantado depois de usar o banheiro, causando uma enorme tragédia. Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: Matt STONE, Trey Parker Diretor: Trey Parker
programme.desc: South Park - T16E01

programme.title: 2012. Cartman lança seu próprio canal de vendas de joias na televisão. Isso gera um negócio bastante lucrativo, já que as joias, na verdade, são falsas. Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: Matt Stone, Trey Parker Diretor: Trey Parker
programme.desc: South Park - T16E02

programme.desc: South Park - T16E03

programme.title: 2012. A grande caça aos ovos de Páscoa da cidade fica arriscada quando Cartman produz evidências em vídeo de uma misteriosa criatura que se esconde na floresta. Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: Matt Stone, Trey Parker Diretor: Trey Parker
programme.desc: South Park - T16E04

programme.title: 2012. Butters é vítima de um bullying improvável. Agora ele quer conscientizar os demais alunos sobre os perigos do bullying e, para isso, ele faz um grande vídeo de dança. Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: Matt Stone, Trey Parker Diretor: Trey Parker
programme.desc: South Park - T16E05

programme.desc: South Park - T16E06

programme.title: 2012. Uma nova garota chega na escola e todo mundo quer saber por quem ela tem uma queda, e Cartman está especialmente animado. Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: Matt Stone, Trey Parker Diretor: Trey Parker
programme.desc: South Park - T16E07

programme.title: 1997. O avô de Stan está fazendo 102 e quer se matar, mas como não pode fazer isso sozinho, pede a ajuda de Stan. programme.desc: South Park - T01E06

Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: April Stewart, Isaac Hayes, Matt Stone, Mona Marshall, Trey Parker Diretor: Eric Stough, Trey Parker
programme.desc: South Park - T01E07

programme.title: 1997. Os rapazes encontram um objeto misterioso em uma escavação escolar e saem no jornal. programme.desc: South Park - T02E14

programme.title: 1999. Vários habitantes de South Park estão ficando cada vez mais furiosos, e sem alguma razão aparente. Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: April Stewart, Isaac Hayes, Matt Stone, Mona Marshall, Trey Parker Diretor: Eric Stough, Trey Parker
programme.desc: South Park - T03E02

programme.title: 1999. Cartman, Kyle e Stan enganam Tweek e Craig para que eles lutem um contra o outro. Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: April Stewart, Isaac Hayes, Matt Stone, Mona Marshall, Trey Parker Diretor: Eric Stough, Trey Parker
programme.desc: South Park - T03E04

programme.title: 1999. A mãe de Cartman dá um presente para ajudá-lo a ganhar o concurso de soletrar. Trata-se de um "macaco da fonética". programme.desc: South Park - T03E13

programme.desc: 2010. O Ninja Patife Mukade está prestes a ser capturado por Naruto, quando ele invoca o poder de um antigo canal subterrâneo de chakra. programme.title: Maid in Manhattan
programme.desc: A senatorial candidate (Ralph Fiennes) falls for a chambermaid (Jennifer Lopez) after he mistakes her for a guest (Natasha Richardson) at the hotel. Starring Jennifer Lopez, Ralph Fiennes, Natasha Richardson.

programme.title: Moonstruck
programme.desc: An Italian-American widow (Cher), engaged to a reticent suitor, falls in love with his brother (Nicolas Cage). Starring Cher, Nicolas Cage, Vincent Gardenia.

programme.title: Mob Cops
programme.desc: When a retired NYPD detective writes a book about his familys ties to the mob, it ignites a firestorm between dirty cops working for a brutal crime boss and the officers trying to bring them to justice. Starring David Arquette, Jeremy Luke, Danny A. Abeckaser.

programme.title: Sicario
programme.desc: Recruited by Matt Graver, FBI agent Kate Macer joins a task force for the escalating war against drugs. Led by the intense Alejandro, the team travels back-and-forth across the U.S.-Mexican border, using one cartel boss to flush out a bigger one. Starring Emily Blunt, Benicio del Toro, Josh Brolin.

programme.title: Run This Town
programme.desc: A journalist and a political aide become entangled in a larger-than-life scandal. Starring Ben Platt, Mena Massoud, Nina Dobrev.

programme.title: Spider
programme.desc: Haunted by his childhood, a psychotic loner (Ralph Fiennes) has difficulty after his release from a mental institution. Starring Ralph Fiennes, Miranda Richardson, Gabriel Byrne.

programme.title: Hector and the Search for Happiness
programme.desc: A search by a disillusioned psychiatrist for the key to his happiness takes him around the world on a journey. Starring Simon Pegg, Toni Collette, Rosamund Pike.

programme.title: Whale
programme.desc: A young boy is sent to live with his grandparents in a remote indigenous community. Starring Timmy Masso, Grace George, Joe Martin.

programme.title: Ozzy
programme.desc: A lovable dog must rely on some new friends to help it break out of canine prison and get back home to his owners. Starring Jeff Foxworthy, Rob Schneider, Frankie Quiñones.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Writer J.M. Barrie (Johnny Depp) befriends a widow (Kate Winslet) and her four sons who inspire him to create the character Peter Pan. Starring Johnny Depp, Kate Winslet, Julie Christie.

programme.title: Steel Magnolias
programme.desc: Based on the play about six Southern women who become close friends despite their eccentricities and complicated lives. Starring Sally Field, Dolly Parton, Shirley MacLaine.

programme.title: Wonder
programme.desc: Born with facial differences that, up until now, have prevented him from going to a mainstream school, Auggie Pullman becomes the most unlikely of heroes when he enters the local fifth grade. Starring Julia Roberts, Owen Wilson, Jacob Tremblay.

programme.title: Lion
programme.desc: Accidentally separated from his family as a child, Saroo Brierley returns to India 25 years later to find them. Starring Dev Patel, Rooney Mara, David Wenham.

programme.title: The Unbreakable Boy
programme.desc: When Scott and Teresa learn their son, Austin, is autistic and has brittle bone disease, they worry about his future. However, with Scotts growing faith and Austins incredible spirit, they find joy, gratitude and courage in the most trying times. Starring Zachary Levi, Meghann Fahy, Patricia Heaton.

programme.title: Daddy Day Camp
programme.desc: Chaos reigns when two clueless fathers (Cuba Gooding Jr., Paul Rae) take charge of a dilapidated summer camp and its ill-behaved attendees. Starring Cuba Gooding, Lochlyn Munro, Paul Rae.

programme.title: The War With Grandpa
programme.desc: Forced to give up his room to his grandfather, a scheming boy devises a series of outrageous pranks in an attempt to make him move out. Starring Robert De Niro, Uma Thurman, Rob Riggle.

programme.title: The BMF Documentary: Blowing Money Fast
programme.desc: As law enforcement tightens their grip, a wiretap on Terry Flenorys phone provides a critical breakthrough; the divide between the brothers grows, eventually splitting BMF into two separate divisions.

programme.title: New Jack City
programme.desc: Two ex-policemen attempt to bring down a powerful drug lords ghetto empire in a drug-ravaged metropolis. Starring Wesley Snipes, Ice-T, Judd Nelson.

programme.title: Sicario: Day of the Soldado
programme.desc: FBI agent Matt Graver calls on operative Alejandro Gillick when Mexican drug cartels start to smuggle terrorists across the U.S. border. The war escalates even further when Alejandro kidnaps a kingpins daughter to deliberately increase the tensions. Starring Benicio del Toro, Josh Brolin, Isabela Merced.

programme.title: Adventures in Public School
programme.desc: Socially awkward Liam has been home-schooled his whole life. When he falls in love with a popular one-legged girl, he abandons his mothers suffocating love and enrolls in a public school, entering a world of sex, drugs and social studies. Starring Judy Greer, Daniel Doheny, Siobhan Williams.

programme.title: Before Sunrise
programme.desc: An American (Ethan Hawke) and a Frenchwoman (Julie Delpy) meet on a train and spend a romantic day and night in Vienna. Starring Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Erni Mangold.

programme.title: Before Sunset
programme.desc: A novelist (Ethan Hawke) and an environmentalist (Julie Delpy) who met on a train nine years earlier reunite in Paris. Starring Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Vernon Dobtcheff.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: While transporting a usually docile Abnormal, Magnuss helicopter crashes, leaving her and Will stranded in the shaft of an abandoned oil rig; they soon find they are not alone in the water.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: While an old friend of Magnus, a pouched abnormal named Jimmy, is handing over a fire elemental to the Sanctuary team, they are attacked by a gang of criminal abnormals from Chicago; the situation presents a lot of mysteries to be solved quickly.

programme.title: Blizzard
programme.desc: A youngster learns about true friendship with the help of a magically gifted reindeer from the North Pole. Starring Brenda Blethyn, Christopher Plummer, Kevin Pollak.

programme.title: Perfect High
programme.desc: A teens (Bella Thorne) life spirals out of control when she starts abusing painkillers and heroin with her new friends (Israel Broussard, Daniela Bobadilla) from school. Starring Bella Thorne, Israel Broussard, Daniela Bobadilla.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: A New Jersey teen (Ralph Macchio) moves to California, meets bullies and learns karate from a handyman, Mr. Miyagi (Noriyuki "Pat" Morita). Starring Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita, Elisabeth Shue.

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part II
programme.desc: Mr. Miyagi returns to Okinawa with his karate student and meets an old foes challenge to a duel. Starring Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita, Martin Kove.

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part III
programme.desc: Mr. Miyagi (Noriyuki "Pat" Morita) and his student (Ralph Macchio) open a bonsai-tree shop, then fight thugs sent by a millionaire toxic-waste dumper. Starring Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita, Robyn Lively.

programme.title: The Next Karate Kid
programme.desc: Mr. Miyagi teaches karate to an angry orphan being bullied at her high school. Starring Hilary Swank, Pat Morita, Michael Ironside.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: American boy Dre Parkers fighting skills are no match for Cheng, the school bully. He finds a friend in Mr. Han, a maintenance man who is also a martial-arts master. Mr. Han teaches Dre kung fu in the hope that Dre will be able to face down Cheng. Starring Jaden Smith, Jackie Chan, Taraji P. Henson.

programme.title: Higher Learning
programme.desc: The harsh realities of identity, sex, politics and racism greet the incoming freshmen of Columbus University. Starring Omar Epps, Kristy Swanson, Michael Rapaport.

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Christine assumes total control.

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Erica Myles, a finance director at a super PAC, enlists the services of escort Anna in an attempt to gain a secret.

programme.title: Minx
programme.sub-title: The Perils of Being a Wealthy Widow
programme.desc: One year into launching Minx Magazine, Joyce struggles to pick a new publisher she can trust; drowning in debt, Doug scrambles to keep his company afloat; Shelly goes back to the burbs to focus on her family.

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: Crunch Calhoun, a motorcycle daredevil and art thief, agrees to help his brother with one last heist. As Crunch gathers his old team and plans to steal a priceless book, he has no idea his brother has his own hidden agenda. Starring Kurt Russell, Matt Dillon, Jay Baruchel.

programme.title: Diamond Tongues
programme.desc: Edith dreams of being a successful actress, but cannot land any roles. When she cant figure out what she is doing wrong, she starts to mess everything up. Starring Leah Fay Goldstein, Nick Flanagan, Adam Gurfinkel.

programme.title: French Exit
programme.desc: A widowed New York socialite and her aimless son move to Paris after she spends the last of her husbands inheritance. Starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Lucas Hedges, Tracy Letts.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: When rich youngsters begin to disappear after an apparent death and then come back to life, the trail leads Will and Magnus to a drug clinic in Mexico run by Nicola Tesla.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Magnus and the team rescue passengers and crew from a sinking ship, taking them back to Sanctuary for medical treatment.

programme.title: Air Bud: World Pup
programme.desc: The golden retriever helps his young owner (Kevin Zegers) and his coed soccer team to shine while outsmarting a wily dogcatcher. Starring Kevin Zegers, Dale Midkiff, Caitlin Wachs.

programme.title: Kayak to Klemtu
programme.desc: A 14-year-old girl readies for a kayak trip along the shores of the Great Bear rainforest with her family to protest oil tanker traffic. Starring Evan Adams, Jared Ager-Foster, Carmel Amit.

programme.title: Eve and the Fire Horse
programme.desc: A 9-year-old Chinese girl (Phoebe Jojo Kut) and her older sister (Hollie Lo) embrace their experiences at a Roman Catholic Sunday school. Starring Phoebe Jojo Kut, Hollie Lo, Vivian Wu.

programme.title: Born to Be Wild
programme.desc: Dedicated teams in Africa and Borneo save the lives of orphaned elephants and orangutans and prepare them for release back into the wild.

programme.title: Miltons Secret
programme.desc: A man (Donald Sutherland) teaches his 11-year-old grandson (William Ainscough) how to cope with bickering parents and the neighborhood bully. Starring Donald Sutherland, Michelle Rodriguez, Mia Kirshner.

programme.title: Gem and Shaz
programme.desc: Two Asian Canadian teenage girls are given one hour at the school dance by their strict immigrant parents and are determined to make the most of it. Starring Jasmine Parmar, Cecilia Lee, Maryam Khalid.

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: In a future society, people are divided into factions based on their personalities. After a young woman (Shailene Woodley) learns she is a Divergent and will never fit into any one group, she uncovers a conspiracy to destroy all those like her. Starring Shailene Woodley, Theo James, Ashley Judd.

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: As a ruthless battle threatens humanity, Tris and Four journey beyond the wall that encloses Chicago to find a peaceful solution for their embroiled city. Starring Shailene Woodley, Theo James, Jeff Daniels.

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Insurgent
programme.desc: Fugitives Tris (Shailene Woodley) and Four (Theo James) search for allies and answers among the ruins of Chicago while arduously trying to evade Jeanine (Kate Winslet), leader of the Erudites. Starring Shailene Woodley, Theo James, Octavia Spencer.

programme.title: Creed
programme.desc: Long-retired boxer Rocky Balboa (Sylvester Stallone) agrees to train Apollo Creeds son (Michael B. Jordan) to become a fighter, even as the former champ battles an opponent deadlier than any he ever faced in the ring. Starring Michael B. Jordan, Sylvester Stallone, Tessa Thompson.

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Anna delivers a piece of evidence against Novak; Ericas relationship with Anna becomes personal; a financier contacts Erica.

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Erica secures her biggest donor yet; Novak searches for revenge; Anna and Ericas relationship intensifies.

programme.title: Minx
programme.sub-title: I Thought the Bed Was Gonna Fly
programme.desc: Bottom Dollar hosts the West Coast premiere of the controversial and illegal adult film "Deep Throat"; Doug tries to dazzle their new publisher, Constance, while Joyce sets out to get a famed writer to contribute a piece for Minx.

programme.title: Heavenly Bodies
programme.desc: Samantha quits her job to open an aerobics studio and competes with a larger clubs lead instructor to become an aerobics instructor on a local fitness television show. Starring Cynthia Dale, Richard Rebiere, Walter George Alton.

programme.title: Lie With Me
programme.desc: A young man (Eric Balfour) and woman (Lauren Lee Smith) enjoy sexual compatibility but have trouble communicating and helping each other with problems. Starring Eric Balfour, Lauren Lee Smith, Don Francks.

programme.title: Charade
programme.desc: A suave stranger (Cary Grant) helps a chic widow (Audrey Hepburn) stalked by four men looking for loot in Paris. Starring Cary Grant, Audrey Hepburn, Walter Matthau.

programme.title: An American in Paris
programme.desc: An American soldier (Gene Kelly) stays in Paris after World War II to paint and falls in love with a French beauty (Leslie Caron). Starring Gene Kelly, Leslie Caron, Oscar Levant.

programme.title: Moulin Rouge
programme.desc: In the 1890s France a courtesan falls in love with a young writer but strings along a duke who can finance improvements to the night spot. Starring Nicole Kidman, Ewan McGregor, John Leguizamo.

programme.title: Jack of Diamonds
programme.desc: A cat burglar (George Hamilton) replaces his mentor (Joseph Cotten) and joins a woman (Marie Laforet) and her stepfather on a necklace caper in Paris. Starring George Hamilton, Joseph Cotten, Marie Laforet.

programme.title: Irma La Douce
programme.desc: A fired French policeman (Jack Lemmon) falls for a Paris streetwalker (Shirley MacLaine) and becomes her protector. Starring Shirley MacLaine, Jack Lemmon, Lou Jacobi.

programme.title: Camille
programme.desc: Marguerite is a well-kept courtesan of the rich and influential Baron de Varville, but when a promising young man falls in love with her, his sincere adoration causes her to question her comfortable life. Starring Greta Garbo, Robert Taylor, Lionel Barrymore.

programme.title: Little Caesar
programme.desc: An aspiring small-town criminal relocates to Chicago to hit the big time, accompanied by his buddy, but once there they find their paths taking them in drastically different directions. Starring Edward G. Robinson, Douglas Fairbanks, Glenda Farrell.

programme.title: The Letter
programme.desc: A woman (Bette Davis) in Malaya kills a man, telling her husband (Herbert Marshall) and lawyer (James Stephenson) it was self-defense. Starring Bette Davis, Herbert Marshall, James Stephenson.

programme.title: Key Largo
programme.desc: A gangster (Edward G. Robinson) holds a GI (Humphrey Bogart) and others hostage in a run-down Florida Keys hotel. Starring Humphrey Bogart, Edward G. Robinson, Lauren Bacall.

programme.title: Double Indemnity
programme.desc: An insurance man (Fred MacMurray) helps a platinum blonde (Barbara Stanwyck) kill her husband, but all does not go as planned. Starring Fred MacMurray, Barbara Stanwyck, Edward G. Robinson.

programme.title: Strangers on a Train
programme.desc: A psychopath (Robert Walker) and a tennis player (Farley Granger) meet in a club car and plot that each will murder someone for the other. Starring Robert Walker, Farley Granger, Ruth Roman.

programme.title: Rear Window
programme.desc: Sitting in a wheelchair, his leg in a cast, a photographer (James Stewart) spies on courtyard neighbors and sees a murder. Starring James Stewart, Grace Kelly, Wendell Corey.

programme.title: Bonnie and Clyde
programme.desc: Acclaimed account of the gun-toting bank robbers and the trail of terror they blazed through the Southwest in the 30s. Starring Warren Beatty, Faye Dunaway, Michael J. Pollard.

programme.title: White Heat
programme.desc: A brave federal agent poses as a thug to infiltrate psychopathic hoodlum Cody Jarretts gang of thieves. Starring James Cagney, Virginia Mayo, Edmond OBrien.

programme.title: In Cold Blood
programme.desc: Two ex-convicts (Robert Blake, Scott Wilson) are tried for the savage killing of a farm family in 1959 Kansas. Starring Robert Blake, Scott Wilson, John Forsythe.

programme.title: Dog Day Afternoon
programme.desc: A man robs a bank to pay for his lovers operation. It turns into a hostage situation and a media circus. Starring Al Pacino, John Cazale, Charles Durning.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: A Harlem mob boss (Moses Gunn) hires a private eye (Richard Roundtree) to find his kidnapped daughter. Starring Richard Roundtree, Moses Gunn, Christopher St. John.

programme.title: The Window
programme.desc: A boy (Bobby Driscoll) sees a murder in his New York tenement, but his parents (Barbara Hale, Arthur Kennedy) do not believe him. Starring Bobby Driscoll, Barbara Hale, Arthur Kennedy.

programme.title: Our Dancing Daughters
programme.desc: A flapper (Joan Crawford) loves a millionaire (Johnny Mack Brown), but he tragically marries someone else. Starring Joan Crawford, Johnny Mack Brown, Dorothy Sebastian.

programme.title: Edward, My Son
programme.desc: A businessmans desire to protect his corrupt sons fortune leads to tragedy in this adaptation of the British play. Starring Spencer Tracy, Deborah Kerr, Ian Hunter.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
programme.desc: Orson Welles tale of an eccentric Indiana family clinging to tradition during a time of rapid change. Starring Joseph Cotten, Tim Holt, Dolores Costello.

programme.title: The Brothers Karamazov
programme.desc: In 19th-century Russia, the murder of a domineering man (Lee J. Cobb) affects his four sons differently. Starring Yul Brynner, Maria Schell, Lee J. Cobb.

programme.title: I Remember Mama
programme.desc: A writer (Barbara Bel Geddes) recalls her Norwegian mother (Irene Dunne) and family in circa-1900 San Francisco. Starring Irene Dunne, Barbara Bel Geddes, Oscar Homolka.

programme.title: I Never Sang for My Father
programme.desc: A middle-aged New York professor (Gene Hackman) loses his mother (Dorothy Stickney) and reaches out to his bitter father (Melvyn Douglas). Starring Melvyn Douglas, Gene Hackman, Dorothy Stickney.

programme.title: Auntie Mame
programme.desc: A bohemian socialite (Rosalind Russell) survives the market crash of 1929, marries a millionaire (Forrest Tucker) and teaches her nephew how to live. Starring Rosalind Russell, Forrest Tucker, Coral Browne.

programme.title: The Childrens Hour
programme.desc: Based on Lillian Hellmans play about the effect of a students malicious lie at an exclusive boarding school. Starring Audrey Hepburn, Shirley MacLaine, James Garner.

programme.title: The Corn Is Green
programme.desc: A spinster schoolteacher (Bette Davis) tries to cultivate a gifted student (John Dall) among illiterate miners in 1890s Wales. Starring Bette Davis, John Dall, Nigel Bruce.

programme.title: The Happy Road
programme.desc: A U.S. widower (Gene Kelly) and a French divorcee (Barbara Laage) team up to find their respective runaway son and daughter. Starring Gene Kelly, Barbara Laage, Michael Redgrave.

programme.title: Goodbye, Mr. Chips
programme.desc: The life of a shy English schoolmaster (Peter OToole) brightens when he falls in love with a music-hall singer (Petula Clark) who becomes his wife. Starring Peter OToole, Petula Clark, Michael Redgrave.

programme.title: Good News
programme.desc: A college coed (Patricia Marshall) tempts a football hero (Peter Lawford), but a student librarian (June Allyson) wins him. Starring June Allyson, Peter Lawford, Patricia Marshall.

programme.title: The Desert Song
programme.desc: A man leads a group of desert bandits against some Nazis, who want to use them as cheap labor for their railroad. Starring Dennis Morgan, Irene Manning, Bruce Cabot.

programme.title: The Wind and the Lion
programme.desc: An Arab chieftain (Sean Connery) abducts a U.S. widow (Candice Bergen) and her children; President Theodore Roosevelt (Brian Keith) sends the Marines. Starring Sean Connery, Candice Bergen, Brian Keith.

programme.title: Morocco
programme.desc: A rich Frenchman (Adolphe Menjou) courts a cafe singer (Marlene Dietrich) who loves a legionnaire (Gary Cooper). Starring Gary Cooper, Marlene Dietrich, Adolphe Menjou.

programme.title: Road to Morocco
programme.desc: Two shipwrecked stowaways (Bing Crosby, Bob Hope) ride a camel and meet a princess (Dorothy Lamour), whom they rescue from a desert chief. Starring Bing Crosby, Bob Hope, Dorothy Lamour.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: An Army sergeant (Humphrey Bogart), his tank crew (Bruce Bennett, Dan Duryea) and stragglers hold off a Nazi battalion at a waterhole. Starring Humphrey Bogart, Bruce Bennett, Dan Duryea.

programme.title: Khartoum
programme.desc: British Gen. Charles "Chinese" Gordon (Charlton Heston) becomes a martyr in hostilities with the army of the Mahdi (Laurence Olivier) in 1885 Sudan. Starring Charlton Heston, Laurence Olivier, Richard Johnson.

programme.title: Them!
programme.desc: Bug experts (Edmund Gwenn, Joan Weldon), a state trooper (James Whitmore) and an FBI agent track giant mutant ants from New Mexico to Los Angeles. Starring James Whitmore, Edmund Gwenn, Joan Weldon.

programme.title: On the Beach
programme.desc: Nuclear-war survivors (Gregory Peck, Ava Gardner, Fred Astaire) wait in a U.S. sub off the coast of 1964 Australia. Starring Gregory Peck, Ava Gardner, Fred Astaire.

programme.title: The China Syndrome
programme.desc: A TV reporter (Jane Fonda) and her cameraman (Michael Douglas) tour a California nuclear-power plant and see the cover-up of a meltdown crisis. Starring Jane Fonda, Jack Lemmon, Michael Douglas.

programme.title: Dr. Strangelove Or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
programme.desc: President Muffley and his advisers man the Pentagon war room, as planes with bombs head toward Moscow. Starring Peter Sellers, George C. Scott, Keenan Wynn.

programme.title: Seven Days to Noon
programme.desc: An atomic scientist (Barry Jones) will blow up London in seven days unless officials ban the bomb he helped build. Starring Barry Jones, Olive Sloane, Andre Morell.

programme.title: Goddess of Slide: The Forgotten Story of Ellen McIlwaine
programme.desc: The forgotten story of Ellen McIlwaine, the legendary Canadian musician who fought for her right to play the slide guitar, a male-dominated instrument in a male-dominated world.

programme.desc: Minnie and Quinn are born on the same day, one minute apart. Their lives may begin together, but their worlds couldnt be more different. Years later they find themselves together again. Maybe its time to take a chance on love. Starring Golda Rosheuvel, John Hannah, Sophie Cookson.

programme.title: Finally Caught
programme.desc: Police find Michael Andrade dead in his apartment; investigation reveals complex secrets.

programme.title: Almost Unsolved Heists
programme.desc: In the sleepy town of Marlborough, where boredom and low pay fuel dreams of escape, a daring heist unfolds in the dead of night, sparking a high-stakes cat-and-mouse game between local detectives and an elusive international crime syndicate.

programme.title: Charmed to Death

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: Police questions Stephen after he speaks to news outlets about the search for a woman missing from his building; when Stephen appears to shut down completely, the challenge moves from looking for a confession to trying to get him to speak at all.

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: Police brings in Sergeant Jeffrey Pelo for questioning after being identified prowling outside a young womans house in the middle of the night; adamant hes done nothing wrong, interrogators walk a tight rope questioning one of their own.

programme.title: Finally Caught
programme.desc: A brutal slaying in a dark alley, a witness haunted for decades, and a serial predator nearly set free.

programme.title: Know Her Name
programme.desc: Delving into the legacy of filmmakers and uncovers the mystery of why women, especially from underrepresented communities - like Zora Neale Hurston and Esther Eng were - have been erased through historical amnesia.

programme.title: Missing From Fire Trail Road
programme.desc: A documentary detailing the case of Mary Ellen Johnson-Davis, a Native American woman who disappeared in 2020. Her story exposes how hundreds of indigenous women continue to go missing in the USA, perpetuating trans-generational traumas.

programme.title: Playing Sam

programme.desc: Tony and Lisa ban all lying in the household, including the little white lies that hold the family together.

programme.desc: Lisa gets upset when her sister Lori begins dating her ex-boyfriend.

programme.title: Family Time - Powering Down

programme.title: Family Time - The Oops Baby

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Love Thy Nephew

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Road to Tradition
programme.desc: When the children become obsessed with gifts, Bernie decides to cancel Christmas altogether; Wanda loses the Christmas spirit when she tries to get everyone on her staff a gift.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Laughing Matters
programme.desc: Bernie turns to Angela Bassett for acting advice when he lands a dramatic role as a stroke victim; Jordan leads a revolt at a day care facility; Vanessa pretends to be poor.

programme.desc: Steves old singing group reunites for an awards show performance, but Cedric has to fill in when a member gets sick.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.sub-title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.desc: After serving time for a crime he did not commit, a vengeful barber (Johnny Depp) and his accomplice (Helena Bonham Carter) carve up unlucky customers and bake them in meat pies.

programme.title: Sound of Violence (2021)
programme.desc: A young killer experiences intense pleasure whenever she hears the sound of human pain.

programme.title: Losing Isaiah (1995)
programme.desc: An ex-crack addict (Halle Berry) fights for custody of her son adopted by a social worker (Jessica Lange) and her husband (David Strathairn).

programme.title: End of Sentence (2019)
programme.desc: After being released from prison, a young man reluctantly embarks on a journey with his estranged father to spread his mothers ashes in her native Ireland.

programme.title: Forces of Nature (1999)
programme.desc: A bridegroom (Ben Affleck) hurries by plane to his wedding, but he and his seatmate (Sandra Bullock) must find other modes of travel.

programme.title: Shes the Man (2006)
programme.desc: Romantic complications ensue when a student poses as her twin brother and replaces him at his boarding school.

programme.title: The Stepford Wives (2004)
programme.desc: A man and his wife move to a quaint suburb where most of the women seem to have the same bland personality.

programme.title: I Love You, I Love You Not (1997)
programme.sub-title: I Love You, I Love You Not (1997)
programme.desc: A Jewish prep school student (Claire Danes) shares stories of anti-Semitism with her grandmother (Jeanne Moreau), an Auschwitz survivor.

programme.title: Kindred (2025)
programme.desc: A pair of twisted, young criminals decide to break into a mansion for one big score, but they soon find out that the owners of the house are much more dangerous than they are.

programme.title: Cold Mountain (2003)
programme.desc: During the Civil War, a wounded Confederate soldier (Jude Law) abandons his duties to make his way home to his sweetheart (Nicole Kidman).

programme.title: Queen of the Desert (2015)
programme.desc: Gertrude Bells life as an explorer, cartographer, and archaeologist for the British Empire.

programme.title: Kate and Leopold (2001)
programme.desc: A Manhattan woman (Meg Ryan) falls in love with the 19th-century Duke of Albany (Hugh Jackman) who has stepped through a time portal.

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love (1998)
programme.desc: Young William Shakespeare (Joseph Fiennes) falls for Viola (Gwyneth Paltrow), reawakening his creativity, but she is betrothed to Wessex.

programme.title: Runaway Bride (1999)
programme.desc: A New York reporter (Richard Gere) travels to Maryland to profile a woman (Julia Roberts) who left three bridegrooms at the altar.

programme.title: Frida (2002)
programme.desc: Mexican painter Frida Kahlo (Salma Hayek) marries fellow artist Diego Rivera who shares her radical political views.

programme.title: Like Water for Chocolate (1992)
programme.desc: The youngest daughter (Lumi Cavazos) of a Mexican family expresses her feelings in preparing wonderful food, when tradition keeps her from marrying her true love (Marco Leonardi).

programme.title: Bounce (2000)
programme.desc: An ad executive (Ben Affleck) seeks out the widow (Gwyneth Paltrow) of a stranger who swapped tickets with him before boarding an ill-fated flight.

programme.title: Jane Eyre (1996)
programme.desc: Charlotte Brontës gothic heroine loves her moody employer, who keeps a dark secret hidden from her.

programme.title: Sabrina (1995)
programme.desc: Sons (Harrison Ford, Greg Kinnear) of a Long Island tycoon become romantic rivals for the chauffeurs daughter (Julia Ormond).

programme.title: Jersey Girl (2004)
programme.desc: A young woman (Liv Tyler) changes the life of a single father (Ben Affleck) who used to be a successful New York music publicist.

programme.title: Nobodys Fool (2018)
programme.desc: Wild child Tanya looks to her buttoned-up, by-the-book sister Danica to help her get back on her feet. As these polar opposites collide, Tanya soon discovers that Danicas picture-perfect life and boyfriend may not be what they seem.

programme.title: The First Wives Club (1996)
programme.desc: Three 50-ish college friends (Goldie Hawn, Bette Midler, Diane Keaton) plot revenge after their husbands dump them for younger women.

programme.title: Company Man (2000)
programme.desc: A CIA agent (Douglas McGrath) recounts his misadventures for two senators, beginning with his wife (Sigourney Weaver) who wanted to write a tell-all about his life.

programme.title: Anything Else (2003)
programme.desc: A writer (Jason Biggs) has problems with his live-in girlfriend (Christina Ricci) and an obsessive teacher (Woody Allen) with a history of mental illness.

programme.title: Hooked on Africa
programme.desc: Featuring deep sea fishing, sea fly fishing and fishing charters in and around Cape Town.

programme.title: Inside Angling
programme.desc: Inside Angling go to Kilombero North Safaris to target the incredible blue tigers that are found in that remote wilderness. The sheer numbers and quality of the fish in that area need to be seen to be believed.

programme.title: Wild Fly
programme.desc: The Great Orange of South Africa ranks as the largest river that flows through this country and is responsible for Rhuans infatuation with its indigenous species. It has made so many unforgettable fishing memories.

programme.title: Wild Fish Wild Places
programme.desc: Denis and longtime friend Lewis head deep into Canadas north to chase trophy lake trout at legendary Lake Athabasca. These fish are beasts - heavy, powerful, and aggressive - and they put the gear and the anglers to the test.

programme.title: Fishing the Wild With Mike Robinson
programme.desc: Joe and Dan go spearfishing with a world champion capable of spearfishing to extreme depths over 200ft. The crew visit a local fish restaurant and Joe catches a Mediterranean snapper and brings to back to Mike in England to cook.
